name: Ricky Iwasaki
title: Software Engineer
summary: Ane ruzivo rweSoftware Developer, achitsvaga mukana mutsva wekushandira mapurojekiti makuru. Kufarira kugadzira kana kuwedzera kodhi kuti vamwe vashandise. Ndinotenda hunyanzvi hwangu hudiki kana huchienzaniswa neinternet, saka ini ndinofarira zvikuru kushanda nemamwe maturusi, masevhisi, mitauro yekuronga.

experience.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Yakagadzirwa uye yakashandiswa scalable web applications uchishandisa React uye Node.js
Yakabatana nemamaneja echigadzirwa kunatsiridza zvinodiwa uye kuve nechokwadi chekutumira panguva
Yakagadzirwa uye yakachengetedzwa RESTful APIs ewebhu maapplication
Yakagadziridzwa zvinyorwa zvekugadzira otomatiki mabasa nekuvandudza kugona

experience.title: Mutevedzeri weTennis Coach
responsibilities: Kudzidzisa tenisi matekiniki muboka gadziriro yevatambi 5-10
Kuita kuti chidzidzo chinakidze uye chifadze vatambi
Inotarisira kuchengetedzwa kwevatambi vari mudare, kunyanya vatambi vechidiki nevakuru, senge 3 makore ekuzvarwa uye 60 makore ekuzvarwa.

experience.title: Shamwari Inobuda
responsibilities: Kuchengeta imba yekuchengetera zvinhu yakachena uye yakarongeka
Kuchengeta nharaunda yakachengeteka uye ine hushamwari kune vatengi nevashandi

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: Webhusaiti inopindura inoratidzira mapurojekiti uye hunyanzvi uchishandisa yemazuva ano webhu tekinoroji
